summary: REQ-122 is primarily about re-running deployment and verifying the live app/navigation. The diff shows multiple code changes (new SmokeCheckPage, router error fallback, match history UI tweaks, backend access/approval logic), but there is no evidence in the diff summary of any deployment trigger/run, deployment success verification, or live reachability checks being performed. Several new UI/behavior changes appear unrelated to simply re-running/verifying deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Trigger a new deployment run using the current repository state and verify it completes successfully, with the app reachable and basic navigation intact (Home -> Match History -> Home).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only includes application code changes. It does not show any CI/CD workflow trigger, deployment pipeline configuration/run output, or any verification artifacts (e.g., workflow files, deployment logs, health checks). While UI navigation buttons exist, there is no evidence that an actual deployment was re-run or verified as successful/live per the acceptance criteria.
evidence: File diff summary shows only app code changes (e.g., frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx, backend/main.mo) and no deployment/workflow/log evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new 'SmokeCheckPage' and a new /smoke-check route for post-deployment verification UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-122 asks to re-run deployment and verify the app is live and basic navigation works; it does not request adding new product pages/routes.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (imports SmokeCheckPage; summary mentions new /smoke-check route)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded route-level error fallback UI ('Something went wrong' page with Try Again/Go Home).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-122; this is an application feature/change beyond re-running/verifying deployment.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend invite-only mode and approval/admin access-control endpoints/logic changes (get/set invite-only mode, approvals).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-122 does not request new authorization features; it is about re-running deployment and verifying reachability/navigation.
evidence: backend/main.mo (inviteOnlyMode, approval checks, access control functions)

hallucinated_features.description: Match History UI enhancements (back-to-home button, filtering tabs, sort toggle/order UI).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-122 only requires verifying basic navigation; it does not request UI/feature enhancements to Match History.

hallucinated_features.description: Home page UI changes (layout/grid updates, new placeholder tile, added data-testid on View Match History button).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of re-running deployment; this is a product/UI change.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Home page updated layout and new tile/testid)

hallucinated_features.description: AuthGate behavior changes to loading logic (avoid deadlocks; 'Checking access...' conditions).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-122; this is a functional change to authentication/authorization flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup dialog change to include optional APA 9-ball skill level selector and persistence.
